QuestData.Title: One of Our Own
QuestData.Description: These wretched creatures captured me while I was scouting the area. Now that you're here, commander, we could really use your help back at base.$B$BOh, and any way you could convince your... friends... to let me go?$B$BThey, uh... won't let me leave.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Shadow-Sage Iskar and convince him to let Jasper Fel free.
QuestData.CompletionText: I had really hoped to have given you a better impression when you came out here.
QuestData.RewardText: Now, uh... could we maybe forget this little incident happened, commander?$B$BBodrick and the other agents would never let me live this down.
